news_header: More than 10 people were wounded, some seriously, after a grenade was thrown into a bar in Grenoble, France. The mayor condemned the act of violence and thanked emergency services.
news_original_title: France: Grenade thrown into Grenoble bar injures several
news_text: Investigators are exploring links to drug trafficking, and the suspect may have been armed with a Kalashnikov. French officials are set to visit the victims.
